definition: to hold/to seize/to catch/to apprehend/to take/(used in the same way as 把[ba3]: to mark the following noun as a direct object)

sentences.english: The murderer was caught on the spot.
Unfortunately Little John was arrested by the sheriff of Nottingham and tied to a tree.
sentences.chinese: 小約翰不幸被諾丁漢郡長的人拿獲，捆在一棵樹上。
